name: Labyrinth Demo
description:
Story

A town is experiencing a strange phenomenon: everyone in the small town is dreaming up awful nightmares every single night. It's the same nightmare for everyone: they find themselves inside of a strange structure, with a sword in front of them. They are haunted in this dream by enemies, and can become more powerful by acquiring items. The townspeople suspect there is something important at the peak of the labyrinth, but no one's been able to reach there alive.

You're tasked to face this Labyrinth every time you go to sleep.

Game

Labyrinth features a procedural generated dungeon filled with enemies and treasures.  

This game encourages collecting a lot of loot by allowing item abilities to stack on top of each other with no limit whatsoever. Items can range anywhere from a simple boost to your attack stat, all the way to making enemies explode upon death, and even giving the player the ability to consume enemies to recover health. 

There are several weapons that can generate for the player to use, each with their own benefits and drawbacks. Spears can attack the quickest, but are weaker than others. Sledgehammers can deal incredible damage, but are the slowest to attack.

Controls

Keyboard/Mouse:

WASD/Space- Move/Jump; E- Interact/Pick up; Mouse/LMB- look/attack

Tab: Stats menu; I: Inventory menu; P: Pause Menu

Controller:

Joysticks: Move/Look; A: Interact/Pick up; Y: Jump; RT: Attack

Back: Stats menu; B: Inventory; Start: Pause Menu
